channel.title: [BUG] Guard stuck behind door in Office Complex
channel.description:
I got my security guard pal stuck behind a door somehow in Office Complex. I just turned around, and he was back there, and now he can't get out; I have no idea how he came to be there.
[img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20578437/BM_Bugs/bm_c1a2b0000.jpg[/img]
map: bm_c1a2b
getpos: setpos -1730.422729 512.781067 352.031250;setang 12.109797 157.285278 0.000000
